title: ExtractionDatasetItem
description: JSON Schema for LangFuse Extraction Evaluation dataset items. Use this to validate golden dataset entries before uploading to LangFuse.

id.description: Unique identifier for the dataset item (optional, assigned by LangFuse if not provided)

ExtractionDatasetInput.title: ExtractionDatasetInput
ExtractionDatasetInput.description: Input structure for extraction evaluation dataset items. Contains all the information needed to run an extraction.

document_text.description: The document text to extract entities and relationships from

object_schemas.description: Object schemas from template pack defining entity type definitions. Keys are entity type names.

relationship_schemas.description: Relationship schemas from template pack defining relationship types. Keys are relationship type names.

allowed_types.description: Optional filter for allowed entity types. If provided, only these types will be extracted.

available_tags.description: Optional available tags for entity tagging consistency

ExtractionExpectedOutput.title: ExtractionExpectedOutput
ExtractionExpectedOutput.description: Expected output for extraction evaluation. This is what we compare the actual extraction results against.

ExpectedEntity.title: ExpectedEntity
ExpectedEntity.description: Entity definition for expected output in evaluation datasets

properties.description: Optional additional properties specific to this entity

ExpectedRelationship.title: ExpectedRelationship
ExpectedRelationship.description: Relationship definition for expected output. Uses entity names instead of temp_ids for easier human authoring.

source_name.description: Name of the source entity (must match an entity in the entities array)

target_name.description: Name of the target entity (must match an entity in the entities array)

description.description: Optional description of this specific relationship instance

ExtractionDatasetMetadata.title: ExtractionDatasetMetadata
ExtractionDatasetMetadata.description: Metadata for a dataset item, useful for filtering and analysis

source_trace_id.description: Optional source trace ID if created from a real extraction

document_category.description: Document category for filtering and analysis

notes.description: Human notes about this dataset item
